item.source: [PI] every shop i make requires points?

item.title: [PI] every shop i make requires points?
item.dc:creator: @Illadelph Illadelph
item.description:
@Illadelph wrote:

317 pi

exion source.

every shop i make ask for points instead of cash… but the shops from 1-18 work… heres most of my shopassistance class.

[code]/**
*buy item from shop (Shop Price)
**/

public void buyFromShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot){
	int ShopValue = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(removeId, 0, removeSlot));
	ShopValue *= 1.00;
	String ShopAdd = "";
           
            
	
	if (c.myShopId >= 17) {
		c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " points.");
		return;
	}
	if (c.myShopId == 15) {
		c.sendMessage("This item current costs " + c.getItems().getUntradePrice(removeId) + " coins.");
		return;
	}
	if (c.myShopId == 21) {
		c.sendMessage("This item current costs " + c.getItems().getUntradePrice(removeId) + " coins.");
		return;
	}
	if (c.myShopId == 19) {
                    c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Slayer Points.");
                    return;
            }
	
	if (ShopValue >= 1000 && ShopValue < 1000000) {
		ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000) + "K)";
	} else if (ShopValue >= 1000000) {
		ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000000) + " million)";
	}
	c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd);
}[/code]

Read full topic
